Main Clubhouse 561-278-6226 Tracy Bradbury General Manager Michael Price Director of Finance ext. 116 Mihai Ripanu Assistant General Manager ext.113 David Morales Executive Chef Jose Rosero Membership Director ext. 115 Jeanine Schwager Assistant Controller ext. 119 Kara Wiswall Human Resources Director ext. 111 Allington Mutimer Tennis Director ext. 138 Banquets & Catering ext. 137 Jenny Andrade Food and Beverage Manager ext. 124 Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By:

Blank Theme Settings Member Login About The Club Pool & Beach Tennis Fitness Dining Membership Contact Us Employment Opportunities SPECIAL EVENTS FORM Menu About The Club Pool & Beach Tennis Fitness Dining Membership Contact Us Employment Opportunities SPECIAL EVENTS FORM start mobile header Member Login end mobile header Membership Be Part of The Delray Beach Club Family Welcome to The Delray Beach Club, where exclusivity meets community, and every moment is an opportunity to elevate your lifestyle. Our private club is designed for those who seek exceptional experiences, meaningful connections, and unparalleled amenities in a sophisticated yet welcoming environment. At The Delray Beach Club, we take pride in offering a membership that goes beyond access—it’s about belonging. Whether you’re looking for premiere coastal dining, social events, recreational activities, or wellness programs, our club provides a dynamic setting where members create lasting memories. A Coastal Retreat, The Delray Beach Club has recently unveiled a stunning renovation, reimagining the member experience with elevated amenities, refined dining, and an invigorated social scene—all set against the backdrop of 3.5 acres of pristine oceanfront. Designed for those who seek the perfect balance of leisure and activity, our refreshed ambiance seamlessly integrates indoor and outdoor spaces. Whether basking in the serenity of the oceanfront pool, embracing high-energy tennis and fitness programs, or indulging in premier coastal dining, every moment is crafted to inspire. Culinary Excellence & Elevated Experiences, With a redefined culinary program, members can indulge in a variety of dining experiences—from relaxed, coastal-inspired casual gatherings and sunset dinners in REEF, to an elegant fine dining experience with oceanfront views, gourmet dishes, and expertly paired wines in BLEU. Our lively outdoor dining space, HIGH TIDES, offers casual bites, refreshing drinks, and a vibrant social atmosphere. At the helm of this exciting evolution is our Executive Chef, David Morales, whose expertise and creativity bring a fresh perspective to our kitchens. Under his leadership, our dining venues offer elevated menus, innovative flavors, and a commitment to exceptional quality that enhances every meal. Beyond dining, The Delray Beach Club is a place where families create lasting memories. Members can enjoy an exciting calendar of events designed for all ages, from festive holiday celebrations, family fun days, and kids’ activities to engaging wine tastings, chef showcases, and lively poolside parties. Active Living at The Delray Beach Club, Staying active is part of the lifestyle at The Delray Beach Club, with premier tennis, fitness, and beachside amenities designed for both recreation and relaxation. Tennis enthusiasts can enjoy professional instruction and programs for all skill levels, from private lessons to social matches. Fitness and wellness offerings include a redesigned fitness center, group classes, and personalized training for a well-rounded approach to health. Meanwhile, our beach concierge team ensures effortless oceanfront enjoyment, from lounge chair and umbrella service to refreshing cocktails delivered right to the sand. A Coastal Experience for the Whole Family, Life at The Delray Beach Club is about more than just a beautiful location—it’s about the moments shared, the traditions built, and the effortless joy of days spent by the ocean with family and friends. Whether it’s kids splashing in the pool, members enjoying a friendly match on the courts, or taking in a breathtaking sunset over dinner, every experience here is designed to bring generations together in a setting that feels like home. A New Era, A New Vision, At the heart of this transformation is an extraordinary team, led by our General Manager, Tracy Bradbury. With a fresh perspective and a passion for excellence, Tracy and the dedicated team are committed to delivering an unparalleled club experience—where tradition meets innovation, and every detail is crafted with our members in mind. “The new Delray Beach Club is more than a renovation—it’s a transformation of the member experience,” says Tracy Bradbury, General Manager. “With a commitment to both tradition and innovation, we are setting a new benchmark in coastal luxury, ensuring that every aspect of club life reflects our commitment to excellence.” Previous Board President, Tripp Rea echoes this excitement, stating, “The transformation of our Club is complete. A new facility, five-star oceanside dining, exciting new events, and an expansion of our family-oriented programming provides an experience for everyone. We are excited to welcome our New Members and New Summer Members to the Beach Club Experience.” Take the Next Step! We invite you to explore all that The Delray Beach Club has to offer. Schedule a tour, meet our team, and discover why our members call this club their home away from home. A limited number of summer memberships are available from May 2025 – October 2025. The Club is also accepting members onto the waitlist for full-time membership. For more details, contact Jose Rosero at [email protected] or call 561-278-6226. Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By: Club Directions The Delray Beach Club, 2001 S. Ocean Blvd. Delray Beach, FL From I-95 Highway Linton Blvd Exit Use the right lane to take exit 51 for Linton Blvd 0.4 mi Keep right at the fork, follow signs for Beaches 269 ft Use any lane to turn right onto Linton Blvd 1.6 mi Turn right onto S Ocean Blvd Destination will be on the left Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By:

Blank Theme Settings Member Login About The Club Pool & Beach Tennis Fitness Dining Membership Contact Us Employment Opportunities SPECIAL EVENTS FORM Menu About The Club Pool & Beach Tennis Fitness Dining Membership Contact Us Employment Opportunities SPECIAL EVENTS FORM start mobile header Member Login end mobile header Be Part of the Delray Beach Club Experience Where Coastal Luxury Meets Community Nestled on three and a half acres of pristine oceanfront in the heart of Delray Beach, The Delray Beach Club is a private, member-owned club offering an unmatched lifestyle defined by connection, tradition, and elevated experiences. Recently reimagined through a transformative renovation, the Club blends timeless elegance with modern coastal luxury—creating a welcoming, sophisticated environment for members of all ages. A Lifestyle of Belonging At The Delray Beach Club, membership is more than access—it’s a sense of belonging. Here, families grow together, friendships flourish, and life’s most meaningful moments unfold by the sea. Our dynamic calendar of events, recreational opportunities, and social gatherings offer something for everyone—from lively evenings under the stars to quiet mornings by the ocean. Exceptional Dining Experiences Dining is at the heart of the Club experience. Members enjoy refined menus and vibrant ambiance across our three distinct venues: REEF offers relaxed, coastal-inspired fare and stunning oceanfront views for everyday dining. BLEU presents an elevated culinary experience, featuring gourmet creations, fine wines, and an elegant atmosphere. HIGH TIDES brings casual beach side energy to life with fresh bites, cocktails, and a lively poolside setting. U nder the leadership of Executive Chef David Morales, our culinary program continues to evolve with creativity, excellence, and a passion for unforgettable flavors. Active Lifestyle by the Sea Whether you’re enjoying a competitive match on the Har-Tru® tennis courts or a group fitness class with ocean breezes, active living is central to Club life. Our redesigned fitness center, personalized training, and recreational programming offer a holistic approach to health and vitality. For beach lovers, our concierge service ensures every visit to the shore is effortless, with umbrella setup, lounge chairs, and beverage service right to the sand. Enriching Connections & Lifelong Memories The Delray Beach Club is designed to foster experiences that bring people together—across generations and interests. From bridge, book clubs, and lecture series to themed dinners, wine tastings, family fun days, and kids’ programming, every offering is curated to spark joy, connection, and community. Whether you’re mingling at our weekly poolside socials or celebrating a holiday surrounded by friends, you’ll feel the warmth and spirit that defines our membership. A New Era of Coastal Club Living Guided by General Manager Tracy Bradbury and a passionate leadership team, The Delray Beach Club has ushered in a new era—redefining what it means to be part of a private beach club. With renewed spaces, premiere coastal dining, and a vibrant social atmosphere, the Club remains rooted in tradition while embracing a bold vision for the future. Come See What’s New. Stay for What’s Timeless. The Delray Beach Club: A place to gather, grow, and belong Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By: Club Directions The Delray Beach Club, 2001 S. Ocean Blvd. Delray Beach, FL From I-95 Highway Linton Blvd Exit Use the right lane to take exit 51 for Linton Blvd 0.4 mi Keep right at the fork, follow signs for Beaches 269 ft Use any lane to turn right onto Linton Blvd 1.6 mi Turn right onto S Ocean Blvd Destination will be on the left Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By:
